router_error_tabs_not_found.message: Could not find the router page. It must be open to carry out admin tasks such as changing the WiFi password.
router_error_tabs_not_found.description: Error message displayed when the router page (usually 192.168.1.1) is not open.

router_error_no_admin.message: Failed to get administrator access to router. Please make sure the router page is open. If you have just re-installed the extension, try reloading the router page.

router_error_logging_in.message: Failed to login to router. Make sure the username and password are correct.

connection_error.message: Cannot connect to the router at $url$. Please make sure you are connected to the network. If the problem persists, make sure the router url($url$) is correct in the extension's settings.

missing_router_url_error.message: Failed to retrieve router url. Make sure you have set it in settings.

options_field_router_url.description: Router URL field on the extensions options page.

options_field_admin_username.description: Username field on the extension options page.

options_field_admin_password.description: Password field on the extension options page.

options_button_save.description: Save button on the extension options page.

options_button_cancel.description: Cancel button on the extension options page.

options_error_ping.description: Error message displayed when a connection to the router URL can't be established. Used on the extension options page.
